/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The street is flanked by buildings and trees on both sides, creating a corridor of urban life. In the distance, a tall tower with a lattice structure punctuates the skyline, standing as a testament to the city's architectural prowess. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a serene backdrop to the bustling cityscape below.
